flags.name: --max-capacity-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

flags.name: --min-capacity-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

flags.name: --threshold-tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

permissions: Admins can update inventory capacities. Non-admin users can update inventory capacities for material sites whose material suppliers belong to a broker the user can see or whose material suppliers are directly visible to the user.
validation_notes: Requires the <id> argument. At least one of max_capacity_tons, min_capacity_tons, or threshold_tons must be provided. Values must be numbers greater than or equal to 0 when provided.
